classmeta.shortdesc: Displays the contents of a cell in a GtkTreeView as a GtkComboBox.

desc.para: Creates a new GtkCellRendererCombo. Rendering parameters are adjusted using the object properties. The object properties can be set globally with (set_property). Also, with GtkTreeViewColumn, you can bind the "text" property on the cell renderer to a value in a GtkTreeModel, thus rendering a different string in each row of the gtk.TreeView.
